name: HTML
summary: I have mastered semantic HTML5, accessibility standards, and structuring content for optimal SEO performance.
details: My HTML skills include creating well-structured, semantic markup that adheres to W3C standards. I focus on accessibility (ARIA roles, semantic tags) to ensure content is usable for all users, including those using screen readers. Additionally, I optimize HTML for SEO by using proper heading structures, meta tags, and schema markup.

name: CSS
summary: Proficient in CSS3, including Flexbox, Grid, animations, and responsive design techniques.
details: I have extensive experience with CSS3, leveraging modern layout techniques like Flexbox and Grid for responsive designs. I create smooth animations and transitions to enhance user experience, and I'm skilled in using media queries to ensure layouts adapt seamlessly across devices. I also use CSS preprocessors like SASS to streamline styling workflows.

name: JavaScript
summary: Experienced in ES6+, DOM manipulation, event handling, and building interactive web applications.
details: I am proficient in modern JavaScript (ES6+), including features like arrow functions, destructuring, and async/await for handling asynchronous operations. I have a strong understanding of DOM manipulation, event delegation, and building dynamic, interactive web applications. I also work with tools like Webpack and Babel to optimize JavaScript performance.

name: React
summary: Skilled in building reusable components, managing state with hooks, and optimizing performance in React applications.
details: I specialize in React, focusing on building modular, reusable components with a component-based architecture. I use React Hooks (useState, useEffect, useContext) for state management and side effects, and I optimize performance with techniques like memoization and lazy loading. I have experience with React Router for navigation and Redux for complex state management.

name: Node.js
summary: Knowledgeable in building server-side applications, RESTful APIs, and handling asynchronous operations with Node.js.
details: I have hands-on experience with Node.js, creating scalable server-side applications and RESTful APIs. I use Express.js for routing and middleware, and I'm familiar with handling asynchronous operations using promises and async/await. I also work with databases like MongoDB to build full-stack applications with Node.js.

name: API
summary: Experienced in integrating REST APIs, handling JSON data, and working with tools like Postman for testing.
details: I have extensive experience integrating RESTful APIs into web applications, working with JSON data for seamless data exchange. I use tools like Postman and Insomnia for API testing and debugging, and I'm familiar with authentication methods like OAuth and JWT for secure API interactions. I also optimize API calls to improve application performance.

name: Git
summary: Proficient in version control, branching strategies, and collaboration using Git and GitHub.
details: I am proficient in using Git for version control, including branching strategies (Git Flow, feature branches) and merging techniques (rebasing, squashing). I collaborate effectively using GitHub, managing pull requests, code reviews, and issue tracking. I also use Git for continuous integration and deployment workflows.

name: Figma
summary: Skilled in UI/UX design, prototyping, and collaborating on design projects using Figma.
details: I have experience with Figma for UI/UX design, creating interactive prototypes and wireframes. I collaborate with designers and developers to ensure design consistency and usability. I also use Figma's design systems and components to streamline the design process and maintain a cohesive visual identity across projects.

name: VS Code
summary: Proficient in using Visual Studio Code for development, including extensions and debugging tools.
details: I am proficient in using Visual Studio Code as my primary code editor, leveraging its powerful features like IntelliSense, debugging tools, and integrated terminal. I customize my development environment with extensions for linting, formatting, and version control. I also use VS Code's built-in Git integration for seamless collaboration.

name: Next.js
summary: Experienced in building server-rendered React applications, optimizing performance, and implementing static site generation.
details: I have hands-on experience with Next.js, building server-rendered React applications that enhance performance and SEO. I utilize features like static site generation (SSG) and server-side rendering (SSR) to optimize loading times and improve user experience. I also implement API routes for backend functionality and use Next.js's built-in routing for seamless navigation.

name: Tailwind CSS
summary: Skilled in using Tailwind CSS for utility-first styling, responsive design, and custom theming.
details: I am proficient in using Tailwind CSS for utility-first styling, allowing for rapid development and consistent design. I leverage Tailwind's responsive design features to create adaptable layouts across devices. I also customize Tailwind's configuration for theming and extend its functionality with plugins to meet specific project requirements.

name: TypeScript
summary: Experienced in using TypeScript for type safety, interfaces, and enhancing JavaScript applications.
details: I have hands-on experience with TypeScript, adding type safety to JavaScript applications. I define interfaces and types to improve code readability and maintainability. I also leverage TypeScript's features like generics and enums to create robust applications. My experience includes integrating TypeScript with React and Node.js for full-stack development.

name: SQL
summary: Knowledgeable in SQL for database management, querying, and data manipulation.
details: I have experience with SQL for managing relational databases, writing complex queries, and performing data manipulation tasks. I am familiar with database design principles, normalization, and indexing strategies to optimize performance. I work with SQL databases like MySQL and PostgreSQL, and I use ORMs like Sequelize for seamless integration with Node.js applications.

name: SCSS
summary: Proficient in using SCSS for modular styling, variables, and mixins to enhance CSS workflows.
details: I am skilled in using SCSS (Sass) for modular and maintainable styling. I leverage features like variables, mixins, and nesting to create reusable styles and streamline CSS workflows. I also use SCSS for theming and responsive design, ensuring consistent styling across different screen sizes. My experience includes integrating SCSS with build tools like Webpack for optimized production builds.

name: Vite
summary: Familiar with Vite for fast development, hot module replacement, and optimized builds.
details: I have experience using Vite as a build tool for modern web applications, benefiting from its fast development server and hot module replacement (HMR) capabilities. I appreciate Vite's optimized build process, which leverages ES modules for improved performance. I also integrate Vite with frameworks like React and Vue for seamless development experiences.

name: Bootstrap
summary: Proficient in using Bootstrap for responsive design, grid systems, and pre-built components.
details: I have hands-on experience with Bootstrap for building responsive web applications. I leverage Bootstrap's grid system and pre-built components to create consistent layouts and user interfaces. I customize Bootstrap themes using SASS variables and mixins to align with project branding. My experience includes integrating Bootstrap with JavaScript for interactive elements and modals.
